name: James Hetfield
details:
James Alan Hetfield (born August 3, 1963) is an American musician.
He is the lead vocalist, rhythm guitarist, co-founder, and
a primary songwriter of heavy metal band Metallica.

name: Dave Mustaine
details:
David Scott Mustaine (born September 13, 1961) is an American musician.
He is the co-founder, frontman, primary songwriter and sole consistent
 member of the thrash metal band Megadeth.

name: Kerry King
details:
Kerry Ray King ( born June  3 , 1964 , Los Angeles , California ) is
an American musician: guitarist , founder and permanent member
of the thrash metal band Slayer .

name: Kirk Hammet
details:
Kirk Lee Hammett (born November 18  , 1962, San Francisco , California , USA )
is an American guitarist. He is best known as the lead guitarist for Metallica .

name: Rob Trujillo
details:
Robert Trujillo [ source not specified 1176 days ] (full name Roberto Agustín
Miguel Santiago Samuel Trujillo [2] Veracruz , Spanish  Roberto Agustín
Miguel Santiago Samuel Trujillo Veracruz [roˈβerto tɾuˈxiʎo]
; October 23 , 1964 , Santa Monica , California , USA ) [3 ]  is an
American musician and bass guitarist of Mexican descent [4] .
He was a member of such musical groups as Suicidal Tendencies (from 1989 to 1997),
Infectious Grooves (from 1992), Black Label Society (2002), played
in Ozzy Osbourne's band (from 1996 to 2003), and has been a bass
player since 2003. guitarist and backing vocalist for Metallica .

name: Kiko Loureiro
details:
"Pedro Henrique"Kiko Loureiro ( born June 16 , 1972 , Rio de Janeiro , Brazil ) is a Brazilian musician and guitarist,
best known as a member of the bands Angra and Megadeth.

name: Mick Thompson
details:
Mick Thomson (born November 3, 1973) is an American guitarist. He
is best known as the guitarist for the metal band Slipknot.
Before public musical activity, he worked as a private guitar teacher.

name: James Lomenzo
details: James Joseph Lomenzo ( January 13 ,  1959 ) is an American bassist who has played in many famous metal and hard rock bands.

name: Alessandro Venturella
details:
Alessandro Venturella ( Italian:  Alessandro Venturella ) is a British musician who took part
as a guitarist in the British metal band Krokodil . He has previously
repaired guitars on tour for Mastodon 's Brent Hinds ,
Coheed & Cambria , and Fightstar , and is currently the bassist for Slipknot .

name: Corey Taylor
details:
Corey Todd Taylor ( born December 8, 1973, Des  Moines , Iowa ) is an American singer,
best known as the frontman and vocalist of the bands Slipknot and Stone Sour.

name: James Hetfield
details:
James Alan Hetfield (born August 3, 1963) is an American musician.
He is the lead vocalist, rhythm guitarist, co-founder, and
a primary songwriter of heavy metal band Metallica.

name: Dave Mustaine
details:
David Scott Mustaine (born September 13, 1961) is an American musician.
He is the co-founder, frontman, primary songwriter and sole consistent
 member of the thrash metal band Megadeth.

name: Dirk Verbeuren
details:
Dirk Verbeuren ( Dutch  Dirk Verbeuren , born January 8, 1975) is a Belgian drummer,
best known as a former member of the Swedish melodic death metal
band Soilwork and the current drummer of the American thrash metal band Megadeth .

name: Jay Weinberg
details:
Jay Weinberg (born September 8, 1990) is an American musician who
is best known as the former drummer of heavy metal band Slipknot.

name: Lars Ulrich
details:
Lars Ulrich ( Dan. Lars Ulrich ; born December 26 , 1963 , Gentofte , Denmark ) is an American drummer,
producer and actor of Danish origin. One of the founders of the band Metallica .

name: Jordan Rudess
details:
Jordan Charles Rudess ( born November 4 ,  1956 , Great Neck , New York ) is an American musician,
keyboard virtuoso , member of the US progressive metal band Dream Theater .

name: Janne Wierman
details:
Janne Wierman (born April 26 , 1979 ) is the keyboard player for the bands
Children of Bodom and Warmen .

name: Per Wiberg
details:
Per Jonas Wiberg[1] (born 8 June 1968) is a Swede musician of the bands, Spiritual Beggars (1998-) as a Keyboardist,
King Hobo (2007-) as a Keyboardist, Guitarist, and Vocalist, Kamchatka
(2015-) as a Bassist, his solo band, Per Wiberg (2019-), and Switchblade (2020-) as a Bassist.

details: Beer in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

name: Ziman Chapin
details: Just a water

name: Iziddan Chamon
details: Vinegar is an alchemical catalyst obtained from the carcasses of ghouls, alghouls, cemetaurs and graveirs.
